about_the_game:
Embark on a Culinary Adventure into the Abyss!

Dive into a thrilling survival roguelike where cooking monsters is the key to survival. In this unique dungeon-crawling experience, you must satisfy your hunger by turning defeated monsters into life-saving meals as you journey toward the 100th floor of a perilous, randomly generated dungeon.

Each floor presents new dangers, treasures, and challenges. The dungeon's procedurally generated design ensures no two playthroughs are ever the same. Adapt your strategy to unpredictable layouts, enemies, and surprises as you delve deeper into the unknown.

Customize your playstyle with over 200 types of equipment, from powerful weapons to rare artifacts that enhance your cooking and combat abilities. Experiment with unique combinations to discover the setup that best suits your survival needs.

All of this is brought to life with breathtaking, high-quality graphics that immerse you in the mysterious and dangerous world of the dungeon. Every monster, meal, and piece of gear is rendered with stunning detail, making your journey as visually captivating as it is challenging.

Will you conquer the abyss, or will the dungeon claim you as its next victim? Gather your courage, sharpen your skills, and prepare for an adventure that blends survival, strategy, and culinary creativity like never before. The dungeon awaits!

name: Abyss Ring
short_description: Survive, cook, and conquer the depths!In this survival roguelike, cook monsters to stave off hunger through 100 floors of dungeons. With over 200 equipment and randomly generated dungeon, every playthrough offers fresh challenges and endless possibilities.
supported_languages:
English*, Spanish - Spain, Russian, Japanese, Simplified Chinese
*languages with full audio support
